name: Pyrochi
description: A sinister bat wreathed in dark flames. It soars through the night sky on wings of shadow and fire, striking fear into the hearts of all who see it.

ability.name: Infernal Wings
ability.description: Flying moves gain Fire typing. Dark moves have 30% chance to burn. Speed increases by 25% at night.

moves.name: Shadow Flame
moves.description: Dark flames that may burn and lower accuracy.

moves.name: Aerial Ace
moves.description: An extremely fast attack that never misses.

moves.name: Fire Blast
moves.description: Intense flames that may burn the target.

moves.name: Roost
moves.description: Lands and rests to recover HP. Temporarily loses Flying type.

habitat: Dark volcanic caves and burning forests
